effect.en: If you have 2 or fewer Benched Pokémon, this attack does 140 more damage.
effect.fr: Si vous avez 2 Pokémon de Banc ou moins, cette attaque inflige 140 dégâts supplémentaires.
effect.es: Si tienes 2 o menos Pokémon en Banca, este ataque hace 140 puntos de daño más.
effect.it: Se hai due o meno Pokémon in panchina, questo attacco infligge 140 danni in più.
effect.de: Wenn du 2 oder weniger Pokémon auf deiner Bank hast, fügt diese Attacke 140 Schadenspunkte mehr zu.

description.en: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
